hero.title: A calm place to read books online
hero.subtitle: Clean reading experience. Thousands of books. No distractions.
hero.description: TextStack is a free online library of classic and public-domain books. Read literature by famous authors directly in your browser — no downloads, no distractions.

programming.title: A quiet place to read great programming books
programming.subtitle: Classic and modern programming books. No noise. No distractions.
programming.description: TextStack is a free online library for programming books. Read classic and modern tech literature directly in your browser — no downloads, no distractions.

seo.content: Textstack is an online platform designed for comfortable reading. The current catalog features classic literature and public-domain works by authors from different eras and traditions. Each book is organized into chapters for easy navigation. The platform is built for readers who prefer a distraction-free reading experience.
